Subject: Re: Depth Charges Threat
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Firedrill stood around for a moment. After that display, his opinion of
this group wasnt very pleasant. He walked over to a stone and sat down to
think, and was calmed by the peaceful nature around him. Unfortunately, he
wasnt a Maximal yet, and had no right to barge back into base. Then he
remembered his comerades, and a smile came to his face. He entered the
base, and to the best of his memory, went to the CR chambers.
